other_tests.findings: Diffuse hepatic steatosis with a few areas of sparing; normal liver shape and contour; pancreatic divisum; duct of Wirsung not visualized; normal caliber of duct of Santorini; potential slight hypoenhancement in the tail of the pancreas; no parenchymal edema or necrosis; no peripancreatic fluid; no discrete pancreatic mass.
